name: IT201_Project1_Logan_Reyes
description: Based on user mouse input, my tool is able to draw different shapes and colors on the screen while also displaying the updated mouse position. When the user right mouse clicks, either a sphere, cube, or cylinder depending on the selection will be drawn onto the screen for 3 seconds until it is removed. The user has the option to select a sphere, cube, or cylinder and also select from the colors red, green, or blue.
